title: Replace 67 Clicker character with uploaded Tung Tung Tung image

requirements.summary: Replace the programmatically drawn drum/stick figure in TungTungGame with the uploaded wooden stick character image (tung-character.dim_300x300.png), preserving all existing clicker mechanics including idle pulse animation, click shake/flash effects, combo multiplier, and score tracking
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded wooden stick character image is displayed as the central clickable target in TungTungGame
Clicking the character still triggers the TUNG! hit effect with flash/shake animation and score increment
The idle pulsing animation is applied to the character image
The combo multiplier and best score mechanics remain intact

file_operations.description: Replace the programmatically drawn drum/stick figure canvas rendering with image-based rendering using the character image at frontend/public/assets/generated/tung-character.dim_300x300.png. Load the image on component mount, draw it centered on the canvas as the clickable target, and apply the existing idle pulsing scale animation and click shake/flash effects to the rendered image. Preserve all existing game mechanics: combo multiplier logic, score increment, best score tracking, floating score text, and the TUNG! sound effect trigger. Ensure the image maintains proper centering and scaling within the canvas dimensions.
